application.doc: Exporting the packet tracing PCAP file

param.name: filename
param.doc: The name of the trace file to export. This parameter is optional and if not supplied the current trace file will be exported.

method.name: GET
method.doc: To export the packet tracing PCAP file, issue an HTTP GET command on the packet tracing resource URI. The output of the web service must be redirected to a local file as it is not screen readable. It can then be viewed in an external viewer such as Wireshark.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
